summary: PURCHASED THE VEHICLE IN JAN/2017 CERTIFIED PRE-OWNED. AFTER ABOUT 2-3 MONTHS I WOULD NOTICE A LACK OF POWER WHEN TRYING TO ACCELERATE. IT SEEMED AS THOUGH THE VEHICE WAS TRYING TO KEEP UP ON A 25MPH STREET. THE VEHICLE WOULD ALSO "JERK" WHEN ACCELERATING. AND JUST TODAY I GOT A FLASHING CHECK ENGINE LIGHT AND A WARNING THAT THE TRACTION CONTROL WAS OFF, HAS A LOSS OF ENGINE POWER, AND AFTER ABOUT 30 SECONDS THE WARNINGS WENT AWAY AND THE CAR BEGAN TO GAIN ACCELERATION.
